rides.name: Sky Ring
rides.description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

rides.name: Mission Interstellar
rides.description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

rides.name: G Fall
rides.description: Brace yourself for a heart-pounding, high-speed plunge into a dizzying freefall!

rides.name: Wonderla Bamba
rides.description: Perfect for first-time thrill-seekers, this takes you on a spin with sudden drops and bursts of speed that will leave you wanting more!

rides.name: Crazy Coaster
rides.description: Hold on tight as you twist, turn, and dive through this insane steel coaster!

rides.name: Techno Jump
rides.description: Leap and bounce to the beat on this high-energy jumping ride!

rides.name: Recoil
rides.description: India's first reverse looping roller coaster! Experience double the adrenaline!

rides.name: Maverick
rides.description: A thrilling 360Â° rotation ride that flips you upside down and back!

rides.name: Wonder Splash
rides.description: Race up a steep incline and hurtle down into a big splash!

rides.name: Wave Pool
rides.description: Surf the tides and feel the thrill of ocean waves in this giant pool!

rides.name: Rain Disco
rides.description: Dance your heart out under a rain shower with vibrant music and lights!

rides.name: Fun Racers
rides.description: Slide down side-by-side tracks and race your friends to the bottom!

rides.name: Twister
rides.description: Spin through a giant funnel before splashing into the pool below!

rides.name: Boomerang
rides.description: Go up and down a massive wall slide that sends you soaring back!

rides.name: Lazy River
rides.description: Float your worries away in a calm and relaxing circular river ride!

rides.name: Water Pendulum
rides.description: Slide up and down like a pendulum before splashing into the pool!

rides.name: Flying Jumbo
rides.description: Climb aboard a friendly elephant that takes you on a playful spin!

rides.name: Mini Pirate Ship
rides.description: A fun mini version of the giant ship ride made just for kids!

rides.name: Magic Mushroom
rides.description: Colorful spinning mushrooms that lift and drop gently for fun!

rides.name: Happy Kangaroo
rides.description: Hop along like a kangaroo with small jumps and big giggles!

rides.name: Mini Train
rides.description: A cute train that takes kids on a joyful tour around the park!

rides.name: Mini Carousel
rides.description: Gentle rotating horses and cars for the little ones to enjoy!

rides.name: Frog Hopper
rides.description: Up and down hops for kids who love a little thrill without fear!

rides.name: Balloon Race
rides.description: Fly high in colorful balloons that spin around the sky!
